channel.title: Temporary Recess in Model Contest
channel.description:
The model contest has been shutdown until further notice. If the contest were to start up again, it would be several months into the future when this board becomes more popular, and when the site starts to gain more attention.
Here are some things to address:
[ul][li]The previous two winners of the last three contests will keep their awards indefinitely.[/li] [li]The featured models will be displayed in this topic as long as this topic exists.[/li] [li]If any future contest is created, there will be a different award and a different setup.[/li][/ul]
Thanks to all who participated. Now, here are the images (sized down a bit):
[i]Winning model of MCW #1:[/i] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/5593/crazzzzzy.jpg[/img] [b]By: Dylan_0789[/b]
[i]Winning model of MCW #2:[/i] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/6937/policehat2.jpg[/img] [b]By: Assassins Creed Fan[/b]
[i]Winning model of MCW #3:[/i] [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/186/95583646.jpg[/img] [b]By: Dylan 0789[/b]
You can leave comments or whatever in this topic until a moderator decides to lock it. I'm open for suggestions for a little while.
And on a last note: thank you so much to everyone who participated!

Hmm, is it ok if I start a competition or you have to be a mod to do that?[/quote]

Although, me and ACF once had a ‘contest’ (of which I won ;)) between the two of us, where the best model won, but he asked for Frell’s permission first.

Did the contest go down the crapper or something?

Sorry guys, when i asked taharok he said he was trying to get niall to get it ready, but nothing had happened since then.[/quote]
